Title: has_any_column_privilege
Feature: has_any_column_privilege ( [ user name or oid, ] table text or oid, privilege text ) â†’ boolean
Description: Does user have privilege for any column of table? This succeeds either if the privilege is held for the whole table, or if there is a column-level grant of the privilege for at least one column. Allowable privilege types are SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and REFERENCES.
